name: AFK Master
description:
GAME FEATURES:

1. Idle System
Set your heroes training while you’re away. When you return to your phone, they will be stronger, gained new abilities, and ready for battle. Grow & Train a powerful squad without all the grinding!

2. Evolving Strategy
More than 300 Heroes in different factions,with specific skills. Cannot encounter against Wizzards? Try Assassin team? Or just fight like a Warrior? It's all for you to decide!

3.Automatic Exploring
Free your hands once for all! Just a tap,and all the battles can be finshed automatically,just chat in game and you can reach the top!

4. Various content
Endless Trials,Tower of Enternity,Meteora,Academe,so many different places to explore and fight in,so many different combinations of mode for you to try!

5. Guild Wars
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war. Assemble with your friends,and fight against the strongest challengers to win tons of reward for free!

6. Worldwide Arena
Put forth your best heroes to do battle in the 3V3 ARENA. Watch them PK online in a multiplayer contest for glory! Best reward for the best you!
